channel.title: A Gamedev's Rant
channel.description: Recent content on A Gamedev's Rant

item.title: Getting There
item.description: Welcome to A Game Developer’s Rant, a blog that’ll make you hate games, and then love them again. There is a lot of stuff being set up on the blog at the momemt, and I’m afraid that this land is as barren as it’ll never be, but that’s about it for now.

item.title: Aayush Kashyap
item.description: I’m a professional game developer who enjoys designing and programming 2D Games. Specialized in development of gameplay systems and experienced in developing games in a wide variety of 2D game genres.

item.title: About
item.description: A content writer with over 12 years experience working across brand identity, publishing and digital products. Maecenas sit amet purus eget ipsum elementum venenatis.
